remarks: Equivalence classes do not overlap.  In other words, two equivalence classes are either equal or disjoint.  Theorem 74 of [Suppes] p. 83. (Contributed by NM, 15-Jun-2004.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 9-Jul-2014.)
statement: erdisj $p |- ( R Er X -> ( [ A ] R = [ B ] R \/ ( [ A ] R i^i [ B ] R ) = (/) ) ) $.
